1441750.name: Chasing Demons
1441750.description:
Chasing Demons


Chasing Demons is a culmination of ALL of Randumb Studios works, where each Secret Word given at the end of prior games is used to customize and tailor a personal gameplay experience unique to each individual player, ensuring that no two players ever experience the identical gameplay as one another!
If you're interested in learning more about Chasing Demons, we recommend piecing together clues from our other titles.

This project is currently in development and continues to be developed as time goes on, as the names of players from previous titles are continuously added to create the lore of the Chasing Demons world.

Features:


  • Be a part of history with Player - Developer interaction
  • The only game of its kind
  • Very psychological and atmospheric
  • Secret Words that change the gameplay
  • Super affordable for a unique experience
  • A Massive List of Players' Names, or names chosen BY players from our previous titles as a BIG Thank You for your continued support! (And the list only grows in time...)
  • Choices are everything...
1441750.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
